name: The Fair Savior
description:
You are a "rebelde de corazón" and a skilled spy. You have infiltrated in the heart of an authoritarian organization. Your mission is to save as many people as you can. Arrive at the train station before the train are gone yourself.

You only have 20 minutes. RUN!

Use the keys A,D to move. SpaceBar to jump. S to crouch. Left Click to shoot and Right Click to shield.
